selfAssignRoles.title: Assign Your Own Roles
selfAssignRoles.aboutDescription:
This channel will allow you to select from a variety of optional roles. Please select only the ones that apply to you.
Clicking a role button will either give/remove the role to/from you, depending on if you already have it.
selfAssignRoles.section1Description:
*Dew Insider* will notify you about the latest DEW News as soon as it hits.
*Market Insider* will notify you about important changes made to #dew-market.
*Dew Collector* will let others know that you collect, and authorize you to post in #dew-collectors.
*DEWsigner*, our artist/graphic designer role, will allow you to post images in #dewsigners.
selfAssignRoles.section2Description: Choose one or multiple of these to let others know how they should refer to you!
selfAssignRoles.section3Description:
*SnackBuster Insider* will notify you about all drink releases and restocks in #snackbuster-shop.
The other two roles, *Gay Baby* and *Weeb*, will grant access to private LGBTQ+ and anime/manga discussion channels.
selfAssignRoles.section4Description: Choose one of these to let others know where you're from!
selfAssignRoles.section5Description:
*Represent your favorite DEW Store drop thus far with its respective team role.*
*Team topic will refresh in early August.*
